title: WaveSpeed AI - Transform Your Photos with AI Style Transfer

hero.heading: Transform Your Photos with Artistic Styles
hero.description: Elevate your images by applying stunning artistic styles instantly.

removePhoto.heading: Apply Artistic Styles to Your Photos

prompt.heading: Style Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Turn this photo into a Van Gogh painting, make it a watercolor effect...

examples.heading: Artistic Transformations
examples.description: Explore the incredible transformations achieved through AI style transfer, adding uniqueness and flair to your favorite photos.

items.title: Impressionist Style
items.imageAlt: Example of an image transformed into an impressionist style
items.description: Bring the charm of impressionism to your snapshots.

items.title: Modern Art
items.imageAlt: Example of an image transformed into modern art style
items.description: Give your photos an abstract and vibrant touch.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Style Transfer?
features.description: Our innovative AI technology creates stunning art from your photos with ease and speed.

items.title: Artistic Variety
items.description: Choose from a wide range of artistic styles to personalize your images like never before.

items.title: Intuitive Interface
items.description: User-friendly design means you can start transforming your photos instantly, no experience needed.

items.title: Secure Processing
items.description: All transformations occur in your browser, ensuring privacy and security for your personal images.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to artistic transformation

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Start by uploading your photo using drag and drop or by browsing files. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Transformation
items.description: Our advanced AI applies the selected artistic style instantly, while maintaining the original image's integrity.

items.title: Download Your Art
items.description: Review your transformed image and download it in high quality to share with others.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join our community of art enthusiasts who elevate their photos with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Clark
items.comment: The style transfer feature turned my ordinary vacation photos into stunning works of art! I love sharing them.

items.name: David Rodriguez
items.comment: As a graphic designer, the variety of styles available has revolutionized my workflow. It’s a fantastic tool!

items.name: Jessica Davis
items.comment: I appreciate how easy it is to use. The results are simply fantastic and privacy-focused.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Discover answers to commonly asked questions about AI style transfer

items.title: What types of styles can be applied?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI supports a range of artistic styles, including impressionism, modern art, pop art, and many others, allowing users to experiment and find their unique aesthetic.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the style transfer feature?
items.description: Yes! Users can access features through daily free credits, with options to upgrade for unlimited transformations. Explore our subscription plans for additional benefits.

items.title: Can I use my transformed images for commercial projects?
items.description: Paid users can utilize their transformed images for commercial purposes, while free-tier users are limited to personal projects only.

items.title: How do you ensure privacy during the process?
items.description: All image processing is done locally in your browser using state-of-the-art technology, ensuring your photos remain secure and never leave your device.

footer.heading: Ready to Transform Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and witness the magic of style transfer for yourself. No sign-up required.
